Question & Options:
In the movie 'Super 30' (2019), where was the principal photography conducted to represent the Super 30 institute?
Options:
A. At a real Super 30 location in Bihar
B. At Ramnagar Fort, which was modified for the film
C. In a studio in Mumbai
D. At an educational institution in Delhi
Correct Answer: At Ramnagar Fort, which was modified for the film
